Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Carton \Car"ton\ (k[aum]r"t[o^]n), n. [F. See {Cartoon}.] Pasteboard for paper boxes; also, a pasteboard box. [1913 Webster]
{Carton pierre}, a species of papier-mach['e], imitating stone or bronze sculpture. --Knight. [1913 Webster]
carton n 1: the quantity contained in a carton [syn: {cartonful}] 2: a box made of cardboard; opens by flaps on top
